physicalDescription.skinColor: Opalescent with an iridescent shimmer that changes depending on lighting
physicalDescription.eyes: Large, black, and multifaceted like those of an insect
physicalDescription.hair: Bioluminescent tendrils that emit a soft blue glow, resembling seaweed
physicalDescription.limbs: Four arms with three elongated, dexterous fingers on each hand
physicalDescription.build: Ethereal and lanky, with joints that seem hyper-flexible
physicalDescription.distinguishingFeatures: A series of glowing, bioluminescent patterns that appear to shift along their skin, forming geometric shapes.

traits.primarySense: Electroreception, allowing them to sense electrical currents and neural activity
traits.respiratorySystem: Can extract oxygen from both air and water
traits.diet: Omnivorous, but requires trace amounts of rare minerals found in meteorites
traits.regeneration: Can regrow limbs slowly over the course of several months

technology.primaryTool: Resonance Gauntlets, devices that allow them to manipulate sound waves for both offensive and defensive purposes
technology.communication: A crystalline device embedded in their vocal cords that can translate languages in real-time
technology.transport: A biomechanical spacecraft named 'Erythra,' which acts as both a vessel and a living entity that bonds with its pilot
technology.wearableTech: A skin-tight suit made of adaptive nanomaterial that changes color and density for camouflage or protection

notableEvents.event: Vaelith discovered a derelict human space station and saved its lone survivor, forging a unique bond with humanity.
During an intergalactic summit, Vaelith exposed a conspiracy by the Vorrex Syndicate, which painted a target on their back.
Their homeworld, Qlithar Prime, was destroyed by a rogue pulsar, leaving Vaelith as one of the last of their kind.
Vaelith uncovered ancient Qlithari relics that hinted at a way to restore their species using genetic memory.

goals: Uncover the full potential of the Qlithari relics and restore their species
Protect the universe from the Vorrex Syndicate's growing influence
